loans.name: Mario

texts.es: Mario, tiene la edad  de 80 años, está viudo,  vive solo actualmente. El con el crédito pretende comprar pollos para su engorde y posterior venta. El tiene pensado comprar los insumos como el concentrado para la venta para engordarlos y así poder venderlos luego al mercado de la localidad. El tiene como meta prioritaria engordarlos rápido para su venta y así generar y obtener el máximo de ganancias disponibles para mejorar su estabilidad económica. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Mario, 80, is a widower and lives alone at present. He intends to use his loan to buy chicks to fatten up and later sell.  He plans to buy supplies like feed concentrate to fatten them up and then sell them in the local market.  His main goal is to fatten them up quickly to sell them and obtain the largest profit possible to improve his economic stability.  This is the first loan he’s gotten from Fudecosur.  He’s had no previous loans with state banks but Fudecosur offered the best loan terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy chicks to fatten up.

location.town: Bello Oriente, Agua Buena, Coto Brus

loans.name: Luis Carlos

texts.es: Luis Carlos, tiene la edad  de 20 años, está soltero,  vive con sus padres actualmente. El con el crédito pretende comprar cerdos para engorde y posteriormente venta. El tiene pensado comprar los cerdos y el concentrado  para engordarlos y así poder venderlos luego al mercado de la localidad. El tiene como meta prioritaria engordarlos rápido para su venta y así generar y obtener el máximo de ganancias disponibles para mejorar su estabilidad económica. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Luis Carlos, 20, is single living with his parents at present.  He intends to use the loan to buy pigs to fatten up and later sell.  He plans to buy pigs and concentrated feed to fatten them up and then sell in the local market.  His main goal is to fatten them up quickly to sell and generate the largest possible profit to improve his economic stability.  This is the first loan he’s gotten from Fudecosur.  He’s had no previous loans with state banks but Fudecosur has provided the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

location.town: El Ceibo, San Vito, Coto Brus

loans.name: Santos Eladio

texts.es:
Santos es un padre de familia de 38 años de edad que vive junto a su conviviente y sus 3 hijos  en el distrito de Tambogrande, una zona agrícola de regular movimiento comercial que se encuentra situada en la provincia de Piura, a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

El cuenta con una mototaxi (vehículo motorizado consistente en una motocicleta que lleva anexada una cabina para transportar pasajeros y carga) con la que brinda servicio de transporte público en las zonas aledañas. Además se dedica a la venta de ganado en etapa de engorde. Estas actividades son la fuente de ingresos y se vale para sustentar la economía de su familia.

Santos desea adquirir alimento para mejorar la calidad de crianza de sus animales y obtener una mejor producción que le permita seguir adelante con su negocio, por ello se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.


Santos es una persona trabajadora y con muchas ganas de superación.
texts.en:
Santos is a 38-year-old father who lives together with his partner and his three children in Tambogrande district.  This is an agricultural area with a lot of commercial activity.  It is located in Piura province, more than four hours from the city of Chiclayo.

Santos has a motorcycle taxi (a motorcycle with a small cabin for transporting passengers and cargo).  He uses this vehicle to provide a public transport service in neighboring areas.  In addition, he also fattens and sells livestock.  These activities are his sources of income and they enable him to provide for his family financially.

Santos would like to acquire animal feed so that he can improve the quality of the animals that he raises and obtain a better production that will allow him to continue in his business.  He is requesting his first loan from Edpyme Alternativa, for 1,000 soles, which will help him to achieve his goal.

Santos is a hard-working person who has a great desire to do well in life.

loans.use: to buy nutritionally-balanced feed for his livestock

loans.name: Deisy Carolina

texts.es:
Deysi tiene 19 años de edad, es soltera y vive en casa de sus padres ubicada en Sullana, un distrito conocido por las artesanías y por los sombreros de palma que fabrican sus habitantes. Pertenece a la región Piura y se encuentra ubicado a más de dos horas y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Ella ha decidido incursionar en la venta de cosméticos y productos de belleza vía catálogo. Ella se esfuerza por mantener su actividad, siempre buscando nuevos clientes a los cuales ofrecerles sus productos.

En los últimos meses su negocio está gozando de muy buena acogida por parte de sus clientes, por lo que desea ampliar su stock y venderlo a su clientela y que sus clientes en su mayoría mujeres no tengan que esperar siempre por su producto hasta fin de mes, que es cuando llega el pedido. Para lograr su objetivo ella se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1200 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.

Deysi es una madre bastante luchadora y que gusta mucho de sentirse activa. Ella ha sabido ganarse a sus vecinos, los cuales la respetan y estiman mucho.
texts.en:
Daysi, 19, is single living in her parents’ house located in Sullana, a district known for crafts and straw hats its inhabitants make.  It belongs to Piura Region and is located more than two and a half hours away from the city of Chiclayo.

She has decided to go into cosmetics and beauty products via catalogue sales.  She strives to stay in business always seeking new customers to offer her products to.

In the last few months her business has been well received by her customers so she wants to expand stock to sell to her customers who are women for the most part and so that they won’t have to wait to get their products until the end of the month which is when she receives her order.  To reach this objective, she’s seen the need for the first time to ask Edpyme Alternativa for a 1200 new sol loan that will help her reach her goal.

Daysi is quite a tenacious mother who very much likes to feel active.  She’s succeeded in winning over her neighbors who respect and like her very much.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to resell.

loans.name: Julia Nora

texts.es: Julia emprendedora, excelente madre, comerciante de granos básicos y variedad de productos de uso a diario. Tiene su negocio desde hace tiempo siendo el principal ingreso económico del hogar y junto a su esposo han logrado establecerse como comerciantes. Sus planes a largo plazo es mejorar la infraestructura en la parte del negoció logrando así ampliarlo y ofrecerle mejor atención al cliente. Con el préstamo comprar mercadería como: granos básicos (arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite), gaseosas, jugos, papel higiénico, jabones, lácteos, abarrotes, embutidos, enlatados, shampoo, crema para cabello, detergentes, golosinas, verduras entre otros productos que sus clientes buscan con frecuencias. Agradece el apoyo a la financiera al desarrollo de su negoció y a la vez a mejorar su nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Julia is an entrepreneur, an excellent mother and basic grains and assorted daily use items merchant. She’s had her business for some time and it’s the household’s main source of income; together with her husband they’ve managed to become established as merchants.  Her long-term plans are to improve the infrastructure of the business managing to enlarge it and to offer better customer service.

She will use the loan to buy merchandise like: basic grains (beans, rice, sugar, oil), soft-drinks, juice, toilet paper, soap, dairy products, groceries, cured meats, canned goods, shampoo, hair cream, detergent, snacks and vegetables, among other products that her customers look for frequently.  She is grateful for the financial support for her business’ development and to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Coralia Del Carmen

texts.es: Coralia del Carmen vive con su compañero de vida y sus hijos; ella posee un taller de costura donde confecciona toda clase de prendas de vestir, faldas, vestidos, camisas, entre otros según el gusto del cliente, últimamente ha aumentado la demanda pues trabaja con material de primera calidad y da muy buenos precios además el servicio es excelente; Coralia es una mujer muy activa con muchas ganas de salir adelante y cumplir sus objetivos, quiere ver crecer su  negocio y mantenerse al frente de su competencia, piensa que la perseverancia es su mejor arma para lograr el éxito, pensado así es como se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que permita comprar tela por mayor, hilos, agujas etc. Coralia del Carmen tiene la confianza que de esta forma podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Coralia del Carmen lives with her life partner and children.  She owns a sewing workshop where she makes all kinds of clothing, skirts, dresses, shirts, etc. according to her customers' tastes.  Recently her demand has risen as she works with top-quality materials and provides her products at very good prices.  In addition, she provides excellent customer service.

Coralia is a very active woman who has a great desire to do well in life and achieve her goals.  She would like to see her business grow and remain ahead of the competition.  She believes that perseverance is her best tool in achieving success.  Coralia decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL which would allow her to buy fabric wholesale, threads, needles, etc.  She believes that this will enable her to provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fabric wholesale, threads and needles

loans.name: Sarita Colonia Group

texts.es: La Sra. Sara  es conviviente,  tiene 27 años de edad y tiene 5 hijos en edad escolar, actualmente  es socia  en la alcancía comunal  “Sarita Colonia” grupo  conformado por  9  socios que se dedican a diversas actividades de comercio. Sara se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza desde hace 5 años y a su vez tiene un carro propio que lo alquila, Sara nos cuenta que trabajo muy duro junto  a su esposo  para poder comprarse su carro y ahora vendiendo productos de belleza cuenta con clientes fidelizados. Sara empezó este negocio con la idea de brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida, gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación a logrado mejores ingresos económicos sus hijos van a la escuela, se ha comprado artefactos eléctricos  , Sara a solicitado un nuevo préstamo para comprar productos de belleza . Sara  cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los préstamos de Edaprospo le ayudaran.
texts.en:
Sara’s 27 years old, has a spouse and five school age children.  She’s a member of the “Sarita Colonia” communal bank which has 9 members who are in a variety of commercial activities.  Sara has sold beauty products for five years and also owns a car that she leases out.  Sara tells us that she worked very hard alongside her husband to be able to buy a car and now selling beauty products; she has regular, steady customers.

Sara started the business with the idea of providing a better quality of life for her family and thanks to her efforts and dedication has managed to improve her income and her children attend school; she’s purchased home appliances.  

Sara is asking for a new loan to buy beauty products.  Sara will reach her goals with much work and effort and Edaprospo loans will help her.

loans.use: to buy beauty products.

loans.name: Paula Julia

texts.es: Paula Julia es una emprendedora que se le apoyado en el financiamiento para comprar productos para el negocio y aumentar su mercadería y la emprendedora nos expresa que con el financiamiento ha aumentado sus clientes. Actualmente la emprendedora está solicitando financiamiento para invertir en el negocio en la compra de semilla, cereal, semilla de trigo entre otros productos.
texts.en: Paula Julia is an entrepreneur who has used the support of loans to buy products for her business and increase her merchandise.  This entrepreneur tells us that she has managed to use her loans to increase her number of customers.  She is currently requesting a loan to invest in her business by purchasing seeds, cereals, wheat seeds, etc.

loans.use: to buy seeds, cereals, wheat seeds, etc.

loans.name: Modou

texts.fr: Modou est un tailleur qui exerce ce métier depuis bientôt 15 ans. Il est marié et père de 2 enfants. A a démarré avec une machine à coudre offert par son père mais a pu à ce jour acheté deux autres machines. Il parvient à entretenir sa famille avec les revenus tirés de son activité. Il sollicite un pret de 75000f pour acheter une machine cornière.Son ambition est d'agrandir son atelier et d'embaucher ses frères.
texts.en: Modou has been working as a tailor for 15 years.  He is married and the father of two children.  He started with a sewing machine given to him by his father but has been able to buy two other machines.  He is able to support his family with the income from his work.  He is requesting a loan of  75,000f to buy an angled sewing machine.  His goal is to grow his business and to employ his brothers.

loans.use: to buy an angled sewing machine.

loans.name: Eraj

texts.ru: Эрач добрый и трудолюбивый семьянин. Более 6 лет он занимается выпечкой и продажей лепешек. Его лепешечный цех находится около бар- ресторана и ежедневно он поставляет лепешки для бара. Эрач хотел бы получить займ в размере 3000 Сомони для покупки муки и угля. Эрач надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Eraj is a kind and hardworking family man. He has been baking and selling flat breads for more than six years. His flat bread shop is located next to a restaurant bar and he daily provides the flat breads for the bar. Eraj wants to get a loan in the amount of 3,000 somoni to buy flour and coal. Eraj hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy flour and coal.

loans.name: Peruanos A Trabajar Group

texts.es: Perseverancia, iniciativa y deseo de desarrollo por salir adelante son parte de las características primordiales de la alcancía comunal "Perunaos a Trabajar", conformado por 7 integrantes todas mujeres desde hace 6 años este grupo viene trabajando de forma paraja y en constante desarrollo, cada integrante en forma individual, muestra de ello es la señora Juana de 61 años de edad viuda y madre de tres hijos de los cuales son mayores de edad. Ella se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza hace 8 años y a su vez tambien vende pescado en un puesto de mercado que tiene como fuente de ingresos para su hogar, el cual le ha dado muchas satisfacciones a lo largo del tiempo. La señora Juana emprende este negocio a raíz del fallecimiento de su esposo dejándola con tres menores hijos a su cuidado por tanto, necesitaba de un sustento para poder sacar adelante a su familia. Con el reciente préstamo implementara mercadería con nuevos productos de belleza. Como la señora Juana cada integrante tiene una historia en particular con buenos y malos momentos a lo largo de sus vidas pero, si en algo coinciden es el deseo de superación que demuestran todos los días por el bienestar de sus familias y negocios.
texts.en:
Perseverance, initiative and the wish to develop to get ahead are some of the main characteristics of the “Peruanos a Trabajar” communal bank which has 7 members, all women, who have been working together for the last six years in a coordinated manner and constantly developing as a group and each member individually.

An example of this is Juana, 61, who is a widow and the mother of three children who are all adults.  She has sold beauty products for the last 8 years and also sells fish in a stand she has in the market as a source of household income; it has given her much satisfaction over time.

Juana started the business when her husband passed away leaving her with three minor children to care for; she needed to find a way to support her family therefore.  She will use the latest loan to stock up on merchandise buying new beauty products.  

Just like Juana, each of the other group members has a particular story with good and bad moments throughout their lives but if they agree on anything it’s their wish to get ahead, something they display daily for their families’ and their business’ wellbeing.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to expand merchandise selection

loans.name: Ligia Del Pilar

texts.es: Ligia Del Pilar tiene 25 años de edad, la actividad a la que se dedica es a la costura ella misma confecciona la ropa que le solicitan  y además tiende venta de mercedaria en general que sus clientes le solicitan ella lo compra para brindar un excelente servicio y variedad a sus cliente. Esta emprendedora  inicio su propio negocio con capital propio con el apoyo de sus padres y su esposo para poder ayudar en los gastos de la familia, ella tiene dos hijos que todavía están a su cargo y están estudiando. Ligia está solicitando financiamiento para la compra de  telas, hilos, botones, además mercadería en general para ofrecerles a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Ligia Del Pilar, 25, is a seamstress; she makes clothes that are requested and also sells general merchandise to customers who request it.  She buys it to provide excellent service e and variety to her customers.

This entrepreneur started her own business with capital of her own and support from her parents and her husband in order to help with family expenses.  She has two children still in her care and attending school.   Ligia is asking for financing to buy fabric, thread, buttons and other merchandise in general to offer her customers.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: Maria Jaqueline

texts.es:
María es una madre de familia de 24 años de edad que vive junto a su esposo y a sus hijos en, una zona rural del distrito de Lambayeque, zona que tiene un moderado movimiento comercial, pertenece a la provincia del mismo nombre y se encuentra ubicada a veinte minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales, ella cría aves de corral y animales menores en la parte posterior de su domicilio, cuando ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta a los negociantes que visitan con frecuencia la zona. Esta actividad le provee de una fuente estable de ingresos con los cuales saca adelante a su joven familia y ayuda a su esposo que se dedica a la pesca artesanal para el mantenimiento de su familia.

María desea mejorar desea mejorar el techo de su sala y cocina, lo que logrará con la compra de eternit nuevo.  Para lograr su objetivo se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles.

María es una madre bastante trabajadora y que siempre vela por el desarrollo y bienestar de los suyos.
texts.en:
María is a 24-year-old mother who lives together with her husband and children in a rural area of Lambayeque district.  This area has a moderate amount of commercial activity.  It is located in the province of the same name, twenty minutes from the city of Chiclayo.

María's business is raising and selling animals.  She raises farmyard birds and other animals in an area behind her home.  When they have reached a good level of development she offers them for sale to traders who frequently visit her area.  This business provides her with a stable source of income which she uses to provide for her young family and help her husband, who is a small-scale fisherman, in supporting the family.

María would like to improve the roof over her living room and kitchen.  She will achieve this by purchasing new Eternit roofing with a loan for 1,000 soles that she has requested from Edpyme Alternativa (her first loan with the institution).

María is a hard-working mother who is always looking to ensure her family's development and well-being.

loans.use: to buy Eternit roofing for her house

loans.name: Ryskul

texts.ru: Рыскул 50 лет, замужем, имеет 4 детей. В качестве источника дохода для семьи, Рыскул занимается животноводством.  Начатое в 1984 году с 10,000 сом (KGS)  хозяйство  на сегодня приносит около 5,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от продажи молока и молочных продуктов. Благодаря упорному труду Рыскул, ее поголовье насчитывает 8 коров, 5 коз, 2 лошади и 10 овец. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Рыскул обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота. Доходы Рыскул планирует вложить в реконструкцию дома, а в дальнейшем - в увеличение поголовья скота.
texts.en: Ryskul is 50 years old, married and has four children. Ryskul does animal husbandry as a source of income for her family. She started her business in 1984 with 10,000 som (KGS) which now brings her around 5,000 som a month from the sale of milk and dairy products. Thanks to her hard work Ryskul's livestock headcount now has eight cows, five goats, two horses and ten sheep. With the goal to further develop her business Ryskul has come to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan in the amount of 40,000 KGS to buy livestock. She plans to use the profit from the loan for the reconstruction of her house and in the future to increase the headcount of livestock.

loans.use: to purchase livestock.

loans.name: Jesus Te Ama Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “JESUS TE AMA” iniciará el segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Senkata.  Está compuesta por nueve integrantes y cuentan con una mesa directiva a la cabeza de la misma se encuentra  la señora Verónica Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: tienda de barrio, tienda de llamadas, carpintería, venta de salchipapas, venta de detergentes y pañales, tejido, venta de papa y chuño, venta de tenis, artesanía en yeso.

La señora Verónica, indica que forma parte de una asociación comunal desde hace diez meses y que en la actualidad ella cuenta con un negocio de venta de comida, que viene trabajando hace años. El crédito de este ciclo es para ampliación de su mercadería (compra de cocina de brostería) que adquiere de las ferias paceñas y posteriormente lo instalará en su espacio de comercialización. Esta forma de trabajo le permite apoyar a su familia pues ella vive en concubinato y tiene tres hijos.

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las capacitaciones de salud y crédito.
texts.en:
The “Jesús te Ama” (Jesus Loves You) communal bank will start its second cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the Senkata Focal Center.  It has nine members and they have a governing board headed by Verónica.  The members of the communal bank carry out a variety of businesses.  Among them we have: neighborhood store, call center, carpentry shop, salchipapas [fried potatoes with fried sausage] sales, detergent and diaper sales, weaving, potato and dehydrated potato sales, athletic shoe sales and plaster crafts.

Verónica indicates that she’s been part of a communal bank for ten months and that she currently has a food business that she’s had for years.  The loan this cycle is to expand her merchandise (purchase of a Broaster) that she’ll buy at the La Paz street markets and then install in her sales point.  This way of working allows her to support her family since she has a spouse and three children.  When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she answers that she likes the health training and the credit.

loans.use: to buy a Broaster.

loans.name: Segundo Valeriano

texts.es:
Segundo tiene 66 años, es casado y no tiene hijos a cargo.  Reside con su familia en el distrito de Tambogrande, un distrito dedicado principalmente al cultivo de frutas, las cuales son procesadas para ser exportadas a otros países. Pertenece a la provincia de Piura, en la región del mismo nombre, ubicada a más de tres horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Al igual que la mayoría de personas en la zona, ella se dedica a la agricultura. Trabaja en un terreno 3.0 ha ha heredado de su padre, allí ha sembrado mango y productos de pan llevar. Esta actividad le permite agenciarse de ingresos con los cuales se encarga del mantenimiento de su familia. Adicionalmente comercializa ganado ovino y vacuno en el mercado de su localidad.

Segundo desea que su cultivo tenga una buena producción, por ello trabaja arduamente para lograr su objetivo. Actualmente desea adquirir abonos y pesticidas para brindar mantenimiento a su cultivo y para ayudarse, ha decidido  solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Segundo is 66 years old, married, and does not have any children in his care.  He lives with his family in Tambogrande district.  This is a district whose main business activity is growing fruit which is processed and then exported to other countries.  It is located in Piura province, in the region of the same name, more than three hours from the city of Chiclayo.

In common with most people in this area, Segundo is a farmer.  He works on 3 hectares of farmland that he inherited from his father.  There he grows mango and cereals.  This business allows him to make income with which to support his family.  In addition, he also sells sheep and cows in his town market.

Segundo would like to enjoy a good production of his crops.  He will work hard to achieve his goal.  He would like to acquire fertilizers and pesticides so that he can maintain his crops.  He has decided to request a loan for 1,000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa to help him with this.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pesticides for his farmland

loans.name: Sairabubu

texts.ru: Сайрагул 53 года, вдова. В качестве источника дохода для семьи, Сайрагул занимается животноводством.  Начатое в 2008 году с покупки коров на 50,000 сом (KGS)  хозяйство  сегодня приносит около 3,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от продажи молока и молочных продуктов. Благодаря упорному труду Сайрагул, ее поголовье насчитывает 1 корову, 2 лошади и 15 овец. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Сайрагул обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 55,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота. Доходы Сайрагул планирует вложить в расширение бизнес - деятельности за счет выращивания картофеля.
texts.en: Sairabubu is 53 years old, she is a widow. Sairabubu does animal husbandry as a source of income for her family. She started her business in 2008 with the purchase of cows for 50,000 som (KGS) which now brings her around 3,000 som a month from the sale of milk and dairy products. Thanks to her hard work Sairagul's livestock headcount now has one cow, two horses and fifteen sheep. With the goal to further develop her business Sairagul has come to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan in the amount of 55,000 KGS to buy livestock. She plans to invest the profit from the loan in her other business activity – potato cultivation.

loans.use: to purchase livestock.

loans.name: Anarkul

texts.ru: Анаркуль 57 лет, замужем, имеет 4 детей. В качестве источника дохода для семьи, Анаркуль занимается животноводством.  Начатое в 1990 году с суммы в  3,000 сом (KGS)  хозяйство  сегодня приносит около 10,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от продажи молока и молочных продуктов. Благодаря упорному труду Анаркуль, ее поголовье насчитывает 2 дойной коровы, 2 телят, также она обрабатывает 4,20 га земли с свеклой, картофелем и ячменем. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Анаркуль обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота. Доходы Анаркуль планирует вложить в реконструкцию крыши своего дома.
texts.en: Anarkul is 57 years old, married and has four children. Anarkul does animal husbandry as a source of income for her family. She started her business in 1990 with the sum of 3,000 som (KGS) which now brings her around 10,000 som a month from the sale of milk and dairy products. Thanks to her hard work Anarkul's livestock headcount now has two milk cows, two calves as well as 4,20 hectares of land which she cultivates with beets, potato and barley. With the goal to further develop her business Anarkul has come to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan in the amount of 100,000 KGS to buy livestock. She plans to invest the profit from the loan in the reconstruction of the roof of her house.

loans.use: to purchase livestock.

loans.name: Gaïky

texts.fr: Gaïky est un homme marié, père de 8 enfants dont les 3 vont à l'école.Il exerce l'activité d'élevage notamment l'embouche bovine. Il achète des bœufs, les engraisse et les revend au bout de 6 mois.Il gère en même temps une boutique de produits alimentaires. Ces activités lui permettent de s'occuper des besoins de sa famille. Il sollicite un pret de 300000f pour acheter 1 bœuf et 3 moutons. Son ambition est de renforcer ses activités.
texts.en: Gaïky is a married and the father of eight children, three of whom attend school.  He is in the business of raising livestock, mainly cattle.  He buys bulls, fattens them up, and resells them after six months.  At the same time, he runs a grocery store. This work will allow him to take care of his family's needs.  He is requesting a loan of 300,000f to buy one bull and three sheep.  His goal is to build up his business.

loans.use: to buy one bull and three sheep.

loans.name: Margaritas De Mercedario Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “MARGARITAS DE MERCEDARIO” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Collpani.  Está compuesta por ocho integrantes y cuentan con una mesa directiva a la cabeza de la misma se encuentra  la señora Roxana. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: confección de chamarras, librería, tejido de mantas de hilo, comerciante de ropa interior, tienda de barrio, elaboración de cortinas, carpintería y comerciante.

La señora Roxana, indica que forma parte de una asociación comunal desde hace seis meses atrás y que en la actualidad ella cuenta con un negocio de carpintería, que viene trabajando hace años aprendiendo de su esposo. El crédito de este ciclo es para ampliación de su mercadería (compra de venesta) que adquirirá con la finalidad de elaborar los muebles, este producto lo comprará de las barracas y posteriormente lo comercializará en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite apoyar a su familia pues ella es casada y tiene cuatro hijos.

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud.
texts.en:
The “Margaritas de Mercedario” communal bank will start its first cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the Collpani Focal Center.  It has 8 members and a governing board headed by Roxana.  The communal bank members carry out a variety of businesses.  Among them we have: jacket making, stationery shop, blanket weaving, underwear sales, neighborhood store, curtain making, carpentry and merchant.

Roxana indicates that she’s been a member of a communal bank for the last six months and that she currently has a carpentry business that she’s had for years having learned from her husband.  The loan this cycle is to expand merchandise (purchase plywood) that she’ll acquire with the goal of manufacturing furniture.  She will buy this product at the storage sheds and then sell it in her sales point.  This way of working allows her to support her family since she’s married and has four children.  When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she answer that she likes the health area.

loans.use: to buy plywood.

loans.name: Jose Ysidro

texts.es:
José tiene 43 años de edad, es casado, y vive en el distrito rural Mochumí, el lugar ha experimentado un incremento en su actividad comercial durante los últimos años. Se encuentra ubicado a una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

José trabaja desde hace once años en la crianza y venta de animales. Esta actividad le sirve para adquirir ingresos adicionales con los cuales solventa sus gastos familiares. El cría animales menores en corrales ubicados en la parte posterior de su domicilio y cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo las ofrece en venta a los negociantes que visitan la zona frecuentemente.

José desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de más animales para criarlos y venderlos, así como el alimento balanceado para su ganado. Siguiendo este objetivo se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles.

José es un padre trabajador y bastante responsable. En la zona donde vive, sus vecinos y conocidos le tienen mucha estima y le consideran una persona honrada.
texts.en:
José is 43 years old, married, and lives in the rural district of Mochumí.  This area has experienced an increase in its level of commercial activity over the past few years.  It is located one hour from the city of Chiclayo.

José has been raising and selling animals for eleven years.  This business makes him income with which to cover his family expenses.  He raises animals in pens which are located behind his home and, when they have reached a good level of development, he offers them for sale to traders who frequently visit his area.

José would like to expand his business by purchasing more animals to raise and sell, as well as nutritionally-balanced feed.  He has decided to request his first loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 1,500 soles in order to achieve this goal.

José is a hard-working and responsible father.  Neighbors and acquaintances in his area hold him in high regard and consider him to be an honest person.

loans.use: to buy animals to sell later

loans.name: Marcelino

texts.es:
Marcelino es un padre de familia de 32 años de edad que vive junto a su familia en el distrito de Morropón, un distrito dedicado principalmente al cultivo de frutas, las cuales son procesadas para ser exportadas a otros países. Pertenece a la provincia de Piura, en la región del mismo nombre, ubicada a más de tres horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales, el cría aves de corral y animales menores en la parte posterior de su domicilio, cuando ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta a los negociantes que visitan con frecuencia la zona. Esta actividad le provee de una fuente estable de ingresos con los cuales saca adelante a su joven familia. Adicionalmente cuenta con un cultivo de algodón, en un terreno agrícola de 1.0 ha, y es a este terreno al que le está dedicando su esfuerzo, porque quiere después comercializarlo.

Marcelino desea que su cultivo tenga una buena producción, por ello trabaja arduamente para lograr su objetivo. Actualmente desea adquirir abonos y pesticidas para brindar mantenimiento a su cultivo y para ayudarse, ha decidido  solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Marcelino is a 32 year old husband and father. He lives with his family in the district of Morropón, a district dedicated mainly to growing fruit, which is processed for export to other countries. It belongs to the province of Piura, in the region of the same name, located more than three hours from the city of  Chiclayo.

He raises and sells animals. He raises farm animals and small animals behind his house, and when they have reached a good size he offer them for sale to the merchants who visit the area frequently. This activity provides a stable source of income which gets his young family ahead. In addition, he grows cotton, on 1.0 hectares of cropland. He is putting his efforts into this land, because he wants to sell the crop later. 

Marcelino wants for his crop to have a good yield. That is why he works very hard to attain his goals. Right now he wants to adquire fertilizer and pesticides to maintain his crop and help himself. He has decided to ask Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 2000 nuevos soles.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides for his cropland.

loans.name: Adjo

texts.fr:
Adjo est une femme âgé(e) de 30 ans. Elle est mariée å un  agent d’entretien. Elle a 03enfants.
Adjo travaille comme revendeuse d’oignons depuis 2004. Elle exerce son activité dans un marché de la place et s’approvisionne à Lomé.
Adjo a requis son troisième crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des oignons. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité et assurer un avenir meilleur à ses enfants.
texts.en:
Adjo is a thirty years old.  She is married to a maintenance worker.  She has three children. 
Adjo has been selling onions since 2004.  She works in a market in the area and gets her supplies in Lomé.
Adjo received her third loan from WAGES in order to buy onions.  She wants to reinvest in her business and assure a better future for her children.

loans.use: to buy onions.

loans.name: Charity

texts.fr:
Charity est une femme âgé(e) de 40 ans. Elle est mariée à un chauffeur avec 06enfants en charge.
Charity travaille comme revendeuses de céréales et d’ignames depuis 2008. Elle s’approvisionne dans les marchés de l’intérieur et vend à domicile et dans un marché de la place.
Charity a requis son troisième crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des céréales et des ignames. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité et assurer un avenir meilleur à sa famille.
texts.en:
Charity is 40 years old.  She is married to a driver and has six children in her care.
Charity has been selling cereals and yams since 2008.  She gets her supplies in the central part of the country and sells from her home and in a market in the area.  
Charity has received her third loan through WAGES in order to buy cereals and yams. She wants to reinvest in her business and assure a better future for her children.

loans.use: to buy cereals and yams.

loans.name: Tomas

texts.pt:
Nasceu no distrito de Manjacaze, Província de Inhambane, Sul de Moçambique, casado e pai de 4 filhos dos quais 3 frequentam a Escola e o outro ainda bebe. Fez a 8ª classe e parou por falta de condições financeiras pela parte dos pais. Vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta os seus pais que vivem com ele.

Saiu de Manjacaze para Maputo, concretamente no Distrito de Boane a procura de emprego. É motorista da bananalândia há mais de 8 anos e tem um salário de 4.700.00mt, que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancária (BIM).
Nunca teve empréstimo noutros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku através de uma amiga que também é cliente desta instituição. Este é o seu terceiro empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 20.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar material de construção para a obra da sua casa (areia, cimento, ferro, pedra, e outros). Os empréstimos anteriores foram de 10.000.00mt, e 10.000.00mt, para habitação. 
Compromete se a pagar devidamente e no futuro pretende concluir a sua casa e comprar uma viatura, para tal tenciona solicitar mais empréstimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
Tomas was born in the district of Manjacaze in the province of Inhambane in southern Mozambique.  He is married and the father of 4 children.  Three of them go to school and the other one is still a baby.  He studied through eighth grade but stopped due to his parents' lack of financial resources.  He lives in his own home with his family and also supports his parents, who live with him.

He left Manjacze for Maputo, which is in the district of Boane, in search of a job.  He has been a Bananalandia driver for more than 8 years.  He makes 4,700 meticals a month that he puts towards his home's expenses.  He also saves some in his bank account at the BIM bank.

He has never had a loan with another bank.  He became familiar with Hluvuku through a friend that is also a client of the institution.  This is his third loan with Hluvuku in the amount of 20,000 meticals, which he will invest in construction materials for his home (sand, cement, iron, rock, etc.).  His first two loans were for 10,000 meticals each, and they also went towards his home.

He promises to make his payments on time.  In the future, he wants to finish his home and buy a vehicle, for which he is planning on requesting more loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: To buy sand, cement, iron, rocks, etc, for his house

loans.name: Beatriz Nancy

texts.es: Beatriz tiene 33 años de edad es separada con 02 hijos  aún dependientes. Beatriz es una mujer empeñosa que con los deseos de brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia decide emprender su propio negocio, donde actualmente cuenta con una tienda en su vivienda, ofreciendo golosinas  y bebidas, poco a poco ha llegado a mejorar su negocio y de esa manera a llegado a fidelizar a sus clientes. Gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación  ha podido apoyar a sus hijos con sus estudios. El deseo de Beatriz es de seguir creciendo en su negocio, y de ese modo obtener mayores ganancias. En esta oportunidad solicito el crédito para comprar útiles escolares para sus hijos, ya que comienzas sus clases del colegio. Beatriz agradece a los prestamistas Kiva por ayudar a personas como ella.
texts.en: Beatriz is 33 years old, separated, and has two dependent children.  She is a determined woman who would like to provide a better quality of life for her family.  She decided to set up her own business and currently has a store in her home where she sells candies and drinks.  She has gradually improved her business and now has loyal customers.  Thanks to her hard work and commitment, she has been able to support her children in their studies.  Beatriz's wish is to continue growing in her business and thereby make more profits.  On this occasion, she requested a loan to buy school supplies for her children as they are starting their classes.  Beatriz is grateful to Kiva lenders for helping people like herself.

loans.use: to buy school supplies

loans.name: Flor De Rosa Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “FLOR DE ROSA” iniciará el segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Senkata.  Está compuesta por ocho integrantes y cuentan con una mesa directiva a la cabeza de la misma se encuentra  la señora Rosa Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de api, taller de soldador, venta de comida, costura de polleras, tienda de frescos, costura de tenis, venta de café.

La señora Rosa, indica que forma parte de una asociación comunal desde hace seis meses y que en la actualidad ella cuenta con un negocio de venta de comida, que viene trabajando hace años. El crédito de este ciclo es para la implementación de un negocio paralelo, este es el de servicio de música. Este esquipo será adquirido de las tiendas comerciales y posteriormente lo implementara en su espacio comercial. Esta forma de trabajo le permite apoyar a su familia pues ella es casada y tiene cinco hijos.
texts.en:
The “FLOR DE ROSA” communal bank will begin its second cycle in Pro Mujer, as a part of the Senkata center. It is made up of eight members and they have a board of directors led by Rosa. The members' businesses are varied. Among them we have: selling api, a welding shop, selling food, sewing skirts, a beverage shop, sewing tennis shoes, and selling coffee. 

Rosa has been a part of the communal bank for six months. She has a business selling food, something she has been doing for years. The loan from this cycle is to outfit another business she has, a music service. The equipment will be acquired in a retail store and later she'll set it up in her commercial space. this work allows her to support her family. She is married and has five children.

loans.use: to buy speakers.

loans.name: Eduard

texts.ru: Благодаря предыдущему кредиту Эдуард приобрел инструмент - тиски, пилы - что очень помогло ему в выполнении заказов. Эдуард просит предоставить ему кредит для закупки металлоконструкций для выполнения одного крупного заказа. После выполнения заказа и получения прибыли Эдуард сможет поменять арендуемое место бизнеса на другое, более хорошее. Тогда он сможет взять еще одного работника и выполнять еще больше заказов.
texts.en: Thanks to the previous loan, Eduard purchased tools, such as clamps and saws, which helped him a lot in fulfilling his orders.  Eduard is requesting this loan to buy metal in order to complete one large order.  After completing this order and making a profit, he will be able to move his leased place of business to another, better one.  Then, he would be able to hire another employee and complete even more orders.

loans.use: to complete a large order

loans.name: Yusuf

texts.ru: Юсуф трудолюбивый и активный парень, ему 21 лет. Более 3 -х лет он занимается купле- продажей женской одежды на рынке. Начинал с собственными денежными средствами. В бизнесе помогают мать и сестра. Юсуф старается расширить свой бизнес, чтобы помогать своим родителям для пополнения семейного бюджета. Юсуф запрашивает займ для покупки товара, а именно женской одежды. Юсуф надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Yusuf is a hardworking and active young man, who is 21 years old.  He has been involved in buying and selling women's clothing at a market for over three years.  He started with his own money.  His mother and sister help him with the business.  Yusuf tries to expand his business in order to help his parents' family budget.  Yusuf is requesting this loan to buy merchandise, specifically women's clothing.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy women’s clothing

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
A la vivienda del señor Juan Carlos le esta haciendo la impermeabilizar, solicita el crédito ya que no cuenta con el dinero necesario para comprar el material. 
Desea mejorar el patrimonio de su familia, con esta mejora ya no tendrá problemas de filtración del la humedad por la temporada de lluvias  en las paredes y en sus muebles a demás evitara enfermedades a sus tres hijos que tiene. 
Don Juan Carlos es empleado de una maquiladora en el aria de producción en el horario nocturno y por las tardes se dedica a la construcción. El realizara la mejorar en horario adicional a sus empleos, quiere proteger a su familia y darles un patrimonio segura y con mejores comodidades.
texts.en:
Juan Carlos is waterproofing his house.  He is requesting the loan because he does not have the money he needs to buy the supplies.  He wants to improve his family's property.  With this improvement he will no longer have problems with leaking on the walls and his furniture from the humidity during the rainy season.  He also will avoid the illnesses that his three children have.

Juan Carlos works in the area of production at a "maquiladora" [factory] on the night shift, and in the afternoon he works construction.  He will make the improvement in addition to his jobs.  He wants to protect his family and give them a secure property with more comforts.

loans.use: to waterproof the roof of his house.

loans.name: Houatémé

texts.fr:
Houateme est une femme âgé(e) de 45 ans. Elle est célibataire et a 01 enfant.
Houateme travaille comme couturière et revendeuse de produits de mercerie depuis 2000. Elle vend dans un marché de la place et s’approvisionne au grand marché de Lomé. Une personne l’aide à exercer son activité.
Houateme a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des produits de mercerie. Elle veut investir dans l’activité afin de prendre soin de son enfant.
texts.en:
Houatémé is a 45-year-old woman.  She is single and has one child.
She has been working as a seamstress and reselling sewing supplies since 2000.  She stocks up at the Grand Market in Lomé and resells at a local market.  One person helps her with her business.
Houatémé is requesting her first loan from WAGES in order to buy sewing supplies.  She wants to invest in her activity in order to take care of her child.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: Flor Kantuta Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “FLOR KANTUTA” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Patacamaya.  Está compuesta por diez integrantes y cuentan con una mesa directiva a la cabeza de la misma se encuentra  la señora Rosa Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: ganadería, venta de corderos, agricultura, tienda de barrio, venta de comida en las ferias, confección de edredones.

La señora Rosa, indica que es la primera vez que participa en una asociación comunal y que en la actualidad ella cuenta con un negocio de venta de tienda de barrio, que viene trabajando hace años atrás, aprendiendo el mismo de su mamá. El crédito de este ciclo es para la ampliación de su mercadería (compra de víveres) mismo que adquirirá de la ciudad de El Alto y los comercializará en su puesto de venta ubicado en su comunidad. Esta forma de trabajo le permite apoyar a su familia pues ella es soltera y tiene un hijo.

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las capacitaciones de salud y crédito.

En la fotografía se encuentran todas las personas que desembolsaran, sin embargo existen dos que se encuentra en los dos costados a las cuales solo se les ve medio cuerpo.
texts.en:
The 'Flor Kantuta' community bank are about to start their first loan cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the Patacamaya regional office.  The group has ten members and is run by a board of directors which is led by Rosa.  The businesses that the members of the bank are engaged in are varied and include: livestock raising, selling lambs, farming, neighborhood store, selling food at markets and making comforters (duvets).

Rosa says that this is the first time she has taken part in a community bank and that she currently has a neighborhood store business which she has been working in for years.  She learned the business from her mom.  She will use this loan to expand her range of merchandise (buying food products).  She will buy these products in the city of El Alto and then sell them from her sales premises which are located in her community.  This work enables her to support her family.  Rosa is single and has one child.

When we asked her what she likes about Pro Mujer, Rosa replied that she likes the heath and loan training sessions.

The photo shows all of the people who will be receiving loans.  However, two of them on the edges are only half visible.

loans.use: to buy canned food

loans.name: Dios Nos Ama Group

texts.es: Buenas ideas de negocio y mucha dedicación es lo que caracteriza a este grupo comunal llamado Dios nos Ama conformado por 7 personas empeñosas por salir adelante. Conformado hace 2 años demuestran tener los ánimos indicados para surgir, tal es a si el caso de una de las integrante la señora Lenadra de 40 años de edad casada y con 2 hijos, los cuales son su motor de vida. Ella por las mañanas atiende los quehaceres de la casa y atiende su negocio ella tiene una bodega hace un año y medio el cual es el medio de ingresos económicos y ayuda de su hogar. Con el esfuerzo de su esposo y de ella han salido adelante y han podido darles una educación  a sus hijos el cual siguen en el colegio también ha podido comprarse un terreno en el cual piensa construir su  casa más adelante. Con el reciente préstamo piensa invertir en mejorar el inmueble donde esta su negocio. Al igual que la señora Leandra cada integrante de la alcancía comunal Dios nos Ama tiene una historia en particular pero si en algo coinciden es en el entusiasmo y el deseo por salir adelante para el bien de ellas y de sus familias.
texts.en:
Good business ideas and dedication are what characterize this community group called 'Dios nos Ama' [God Loves Us]. It is made up of 7 hard-working people who want to get ahead. The group was formed 2 years ago, when the members demonstrated that they had the desire to work together.

Leandra, one of the group members, is 40 years old and is married with two children, who are her reason to live. In the mornings she tends to the household chores and also watches over her small store. She has had the store for a year and a half; it is a source of income which allows her to contribute to her family's expenses. With the joint effort of her and her husband, they have been able to move forward and provide an education to their children who are currently both studying. They were also able to buy land in which they hope to build a house on in the future. With this loan she plans to invest in improvements to the property where her store is located. Like Leandra, each member of the group has their own unique story, but one thing they all have in common is their enthusiasm and desire to get ahead for the good of one another and for their families.

loans.use: improve the property where her business is located.

loans.name: Rukiyamo

texts.ru: Рукиямо замужем и любящая мать пятерых детей. Она очень трудолюбивая женщина и всегда старается стать успешной женщиной. Более 5 лет она занимается купле- продажей детских игрушек, парфюмерных изделий, сувениров, женского белья и платков. Имеет богатый опыт в этой сфере бизнеса. Кроме данного бизнеса она предоставляет услуги проката свадебных платьев. Рукиямо хотела бы получить займ для покупки товара с целью увлечения ассортимента товаров.
texts.en: Rykiyamo is married and is a loving mother of five children. She is very hardworking and always tries to be a successful woman. She has been buying and reselling children's toys, perfumes, souvenirs, women's undergarments and scarves for more than five years. She has a rich experience in this business. Besides this business she provides a service in bridal gown rentals. Rukiyamo wants to take out a loan to buy merchandise with the goal to increase the variety of her inventory.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Kymbat

texts.ru:
Кымбат 56 лет, вдова, имеет 6 детей. В качестве источника дохода для семьи, Кымбат занимается животноводством и полеводством.  Начатое еще в период Советского Союза с 10,000 сом (KGS)  хозяйство  на сегодня приносит около 8,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. На данный момент в хозяйстве Кымбат  имеется 4коровы и 20 овец, а также 1,80 га земли с клевером. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Кымбат обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 65,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дополнительных голов скота. Доходы Кымбат планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота.
texts.en:
Kymbat is 56 years old, a widow and has six children. Kymbat does animal husbandry and field crop cultivation as a source of income for her family. She started her business during the Soviet period with 10,000 som (KGS) which now brings her around 8,000 som a month. At this time Kymbat's business has four cows and twenty sheep as well as 1,80 hectares of land with clover.

With the goal to further develop her business Kymbat has come to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan in the amount of 65,000 KGS to buy additional livestock. She plans to invest the profit from the loan in the further increase of the headcount of livestock.

loans.use: to purchase livestock.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy blouses, skirts and underwear.

loans.name: Jurakul

texts.ru: Чуракул трудолюбивый и целеустремленный семьянин, на воспитании имеет четверых детей. Более 15 лет он занимается скотоводством, отличительной чертой бизнеса является то, что он сам по специальности ветеринар и хорошо знаком со спецификой данного бизнеса. Он постоянно увеличивает  поголовье скота и в этом ему помогают жена и дети. Чуракул запрашивает займ в размере 12000 Сомони для ремонта и перестройки жилого дома.
texts.en: Jurakul is a hardworking and goal oriented family man who has four children. He has been in the animal husbandry business for more than fifteen years and his unique feature is that he is a veterinarian by profession and is very familiar with the specifics of this business. He constantly increases the headcount of livestock in which his wife and children help him. Jurakul is asking for a loan in the amount of 12,000 somoni to repair and rebuild his house.

loans.use: to repair his house.

loans.name: Nueva Vida Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “NUEVA VIDA” iniciará el tercer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Collpani.  Está compuesta por once integrantes y cuentan con una mesa directiva a la cabeza de la misma se encuentra  la señora Fabiola. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de abarrotes, venta carnes frías, taller de costura, venta de alfombras, venta de ropa deportiva, venta de mantas, venta de pantalones.

La señora Fabiola, indica que forma parte de una asociación comunal desde hace una año atrás y que en la actualidad ella cuenta con un negocio venta de ropa, que viene trabajando hace años. El crédito de este ciclo es para ampliación de su mercadería (compra de ropa) este producto lo comprará de las ferias paceñas y posteriormente lo comercializará en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite apoyar a su familia pues ella no es soltera y tiene seis hijos.

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud por el consultorio y las capacitaciones.
texts.en:
The community association 'Nueva Vida' [New Life] will be beginning their third loan cycle with 'Pro Mujer' [For Women] as a part of the 'Centro Focal de Collpani'. The group is made up of eleven members and has a board of directors that is led by Fabiola. The businesses that the members of the group are involved with are varied and include: selling groceries, selling meat, sewing, selling carpets, selling athletic clothing, selling blankets and selling pants.     

Fabiola said that she joined a community association a year ago. She has a business selling clothes, in which she has been working for many years. With this loan cycle she will use the money to increase her merchandise by buying more clothes. She buys from the markets and later re-sells the clothing from her business location. This work allows her to support her family; she is married and has six children.    

When she was asked what she likes about 'Pro Mujer' [For Women] she said that she likes the consultations and trainings she receives about health.

loans.use: to buy clothes

loans.name: Rosa Elvira

texts.es:
Rosa tiene 31 años de edad, es soltera y vive en casa propia en el distrito de Túcume, perteneciente a la ciudad de Chiclayo, conocida a nivel nacional sus atractivos turísticos. 

Se dedica a trabajar como vendedora y confeccionista de prendas de vestir desde hace cinco años. Inició trabajando hace cinco años en un pequeño taller de confección instalado en su propio domicilio. Ella ha implementado una pequeña sastrería y allí se dedica a confeccionar prendas de vestir para ofrecerlas a la venta, por otro lado también encarga ropa al por mayor en la ciudad de Lima para ofrecerla en su puesto de venta.

Rosa trata de sacar adelante a su negocio con mucho esfuerzo, la calidad de las prendas que confecciona han hecho que su trabajo tenga muy buena acogida. Ella desea adquirir ropa y telas para confeccionar y de esta manera complementar su negocio y poco a poco ampliarlo, siguiendo su objetivo se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 500 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograrlo.

Rosa es alegre y bastante trabajadora. Su mayor anhelo es ampliar su taller y crear su propia línea de ropa.
texts.en:
Rosa, 31, is single and lives in her own house in the Túcume district in the city of Chiclayo, known nationally for its tourist attractions.

She has worked for five years selling and making garments.  She began working five years ago in a small dressmaker shop set up in her own home.  She has set up a small tailor's shop where she works making garments to sell.  She also orders clothing wholesale in the city of Lima to sell in her sales stand.

Rosa tries to get her business ahead with a lot of effort.  The quality of the garments she makes has made her work have a very good reception.  She wants to acquire clothing and fabric to sew and in this way complement her business and expand it little by little.  Following this goal, she has found it necessary to request a loan of 500 PEN from Edpyme Alternativa so they will help her achieve it.

Rosa is happy and very hardworking.  Her biggest desire is to expand her workshop and create her own line of clothing.

loans.use: to buy clothing and fabric to make garments.

loans.name: Erkinai

texts.ru:
Эркинай 29 лет, замужем, воспитывает одного сына.   В 2000 году, в поисках дохода для своей семьи, Эркинай начала свой бизнес в реализации сотовых телефонов и аксессуаров.
Благодаря настойчивости  и упорному труду,  стартовав с начальной суммой 1,000 сом ( KGS), Эркинай сумела развить свой бизнес  с ежемесячным доходом  в 10,000 сом (KGS). На сегодняшний день ассортимент товаров не представлен в изобилии, и по этой причине Эркинай  обратилась  в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на расширение  ассортимента.  Доходы от кредита Эркинай  планирует вложить в развитие бизнеса.
texts.en: Erkinai is 29 years old, married and is raising one son. In 2000 in search of income for her family Erkinai started her business selling mobile phones and accessories. Thanks to her steadfast and hard work Erkinai was able to develop her business with a monthly income of 10,000 KGS starting with 1,000 som (KGS). At this time the assortment of goods is not presented in excess and this is the reason Erkinai has come to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan in the amount of 70,000 KGS to expand the variety of her merchandise. She plans to invest the income from the loan into developing of her business.

loans.use: to expand the variety of merchandise.

loans.name: Kuidi

texts.ru: Куйди женат и ответственный отец четверых детей. Он очень трудолюбивый человек, который занимается купле- продажей сухофруктов. В течении последних 4 –х лет он занимается этим видом бизнеса. Стабильно расширяет разновидность своих товаров. В бизнесе помогают жена и дети. Куйди запрашивает займ для покупки дополнительных товаров с целью расширения оборотного капитала.
texts.en: Kuidi is married and is a responsible father of four children. He is a very hardworking man who buys and sells dry fruits. During the last four years he has been in this business. He steadily expands the variety of his goods. His wife and children help him in the business. Kuidi is asking for a loan to buy additional goods with the goal to increase his working capital.

loans.use: to buy dry fruits.

loans.name: Janyl

texts.ru: Жаныл 22 года, замужем, воспитывает сына. В качестве источника дохода для семьи, Жаныл занимается животноводством.  Начатое 2 года назад с покупки коровы на сумму в  70,000 сом (KGS)  хозяйство  сегодня приносит около 5,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от продажи молока и молочных продуктов. Благодаря упорному труду Жаныл, ее поголовье насчитывает 2 дойной коровы, 1 теленка, 5 овец, также она обрабатывает 0,36 га земли с картофелем и ячменем. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Жаныл обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 135,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота. Доходы Жаныл планирует вложить в ремонт своего дома.
texts.en: Janyl is 22 years old, married and raising a son. As a source of income for her family Janyl does animal husbandry. She started the business two years ago with the purchase of a cow in the amount of 70,000 KGS and now the business brings her around 5,000 som (KGS) a month from the sale of milk and dairy products. Thanks to her hard work Janyl's livestock headcount has two milk cows, one calf, five sheep as well as 0,36 hectares of land which she cultivates with potatoes and barley. With the purpose to further develop her business Janyl has come to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan in the amount of 135,000 KGS to buy livestock. She plans to invest the profit in the repair of her house.

loans.use: to purchase livestock.

loans.name: Wilmer

texts.es:
Wilmer tiene 29 años de edad y es soltero.  Vive en el distrito de Tambogrande, un distrito dedicado principalmente al cultivo de frutas, las cuales son procesadas para ser exportadas a otros países. Pertenece a la provincia de Piura, en la región del mismo nombre, ubicada a más de tres horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Al igual que la mayoría de personas en la zona, el se dedica a la agricultura.  Tiene 0.5 ha de terreno agrícola, allí siembra limón el cual cosecha semanalmente. Esta actividad le permite agenciarse de ingresos con los cuales cubre sus gastos personales. 

Wilmer desea que su cultivo tenga una buena producción, por ello trabaja arduamente para lograr su objetivo. Actualmente desea adquirir abonos y pesticidas para brindar mantenimiento a su cultivo y para ayudarse, ha decidido  solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1200 nuevos soles.

Wilmer es alguien conocido en la zona, sus vecinos le consideran una persona trabajadora y responsable. Su mayor anhelo es tener éxito en su actual cosecha y en las cosechas futuras y de esta manera progresar.
texts.en:
Wilmer is 29 years old and is single. He lives in the district of Tambogrande, an area that is dedicated principally to the cultivation of fruit, which are processed for export to other countries. Tambogrande is a part of the province of Piura, in the region of the same name, located more than 3 hours from the city of Chiclayo. 

Like the majority of the people who live in this area, he works in agriculture. He has .5 hectares of agricultural land where he grows lemons that he harvests on a weekly basis. This work allows him to have income that covers his personal expenses. 

Wilmer wants his crops to have a good production, and in order to achieve this goal he works hard. He currently wants to buy fertilizers and pesticides to maintain his crop; to help with this he has decided to request a loan of 1200 nuevo soles through 'Edpyme Alternativa'.   

Wilmer is well known in the area and considered to be responsible and a hard worker by his neighbors. His greatest desire is to have success in his current crop and in the future crops, and in this way continue moving forward.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides for his lemon crop.

loans.name: Sha'migul

texts.ru: Шаъмигул жительница города Дангара. Ей 46 лет. Она замужем. У нее семеро детей. Двое ее сыновей находятся на заработках заграницей. Сама Шаъмигул занимается птицеводством. Она занимается разведением несколько видов домашних птиц. Этим видом деятельности занимается восемь лет. Кредит берет для приобретения кур и цыплят.
texts.en: Sha'migul is a resident of the town of Dangara. She is 46 years old, married and has seven children. Her two sons are now working abroad. Sha'migul breeds poultry. She breeds several kinds of domestic birds and has been in this business for eight years. She is taking out the loan to buy chickens and hens.

loans.use: to buy chickens and hens.

loans.name: Mukadaskhan

texts.ru: Мукадасхан  37 лет, замужем, воспитывает трех детей, младший из которых посещает детский сад.   Мукадасхан – швея по образованию, что помогло ей в 2008 году, в поисках источника дохода для своей семьи, начать пошив собственных изделий и затем их продавать. Со временем, Мукадасхан расширила представленный ассортимент продаваемых вещей за счет закупа уже готовой продукции детской одежды и женского белья.   Благодаря настойчивости  и упорному труду,  Мукадасхан сумела развить свой бизнес  с ежемесячным доходом  в 15,000 сом (KGS). На сегодняшний день ассортимент товаров не представлен в изобилии, и по этой причине Мукадасхан  обратилась  в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) на расширение  весеннего ассортимента одежды.  Доходы от кредита Мукадасхан  планирует частично вложить в ремонт квартиры, и часть – в развитие бизнеса.
texts.en:
Mukadaskhan is 37 years old, married, and raising three children, of which the youngest one is in kindergarten. Mukadaskhan is a seamstress by education, which helped her when she in 2008, in search of a source of income for her family, started sewing her own products for selling. 

In the course of time, Mukadaskhan expanded the range of products, also selling things by purchasing finished products of children's clothing and lingerie. Thanks to her perseverance and hard work, Mukadaskhan was able to develop her business to a monthly income of 15,000 som (KGS). 

Today the assortment of products is not abundant, and for this reason, Mukadaskhan turned to the company "Bai Tushum & Partners" for a loan in the amount of 80,000 som (KGS) to expand the range of spring clothing. Mukadaskhan plans to use part of the income to repair her apartment and the rest to develop her business

loans.use: to broaden the assortment of spring clothing

loans.name: Ma.corazon

texts.en:
Ma. Corazon is 62 years old and married with four children.

Ma. Corazon works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stock for her store and feed for her pigs.

Ma. Corazon has borrowed and paid 16 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and also earns an additional income from hog raising.

Ma. Corazon aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock for her store and feed for her pigs.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.ru: Ахмад добрый и честный человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет троих несовершеннолетних детей. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Более 4-х лет Ахмад занимается выращиванием и продажей сельхозпродуктов, имеет богатый опыт. В бизнесе помогают жена и дети. Ахмад запрашивает займ в размере 3500 Сомони для покупки семян и минеральных удобрений. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Ahmad is a kind and honest man. He is married and is raising three underage children. His wife is a homemaker. Ahmad has been cultivating and selling agricultural crops for more than four years. He has a rich experience. His wife and children help him in the business. Ahmad is asking for a loan in the amount of 3,500 somoni to buy seeds and mineral fertilizer. He hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy seeds and mineral fertilizer.

loans.name: Roza

texts.ru:
Розе 59 лет, замужем, имеет 4 детей. В качестве источника дохода для семьи, Роза занимается животноводством.  Начатое 30 лет назад с 5,000 сом (KGS)  хозяйство  на сегодня приносит около 4,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. На данный момент в хозяйстве Розы  имеется 2 дойные коровы и 5 овец.
 В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Роза обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дополнительных голов скота. Доходы Роза планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота.
texts.en:
Roza is 59 years old, married and has four children. As a source of income for the family, Roza is engaged in livestock breeding. Having started 30 years ago with 5,000 som (KGS), the farm today brings in around 4,000 som (KGS) per month. Currently Roza owns two milking cows and five sheep.

With an aim to further develop her business, Roza turned to the organization "Bai Tushum & Partners" for a loan in the amount of 70,000 som (KGS) to purchase additional heads of livestock. Roza plans to invest the income in a further increase in the number of heads of livestock.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Nizomjon

texts.ru: Низомчон умный и порядочный семьянин. Начал работу со скотоводства, затем постепенно перешел на птицеводство. В обороте имеет 2000 штук курицы. В бизнесе помогает сын. Низомчон хочет улучшить свои жилищные условия и с этой целью запрашивает займ для покупки цемента и гравия. Он планирует построить трехкомнатный дом. Низочжон надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Nizomjon is a smart and decent family man. He started his business with animal husbandry and then gradually switched to poultry. He has 2,000 chickens in stock. His son helps him in the business. Nizomjon wants to improve his living conditions and is asking for a loan with this purpose to buy cement and gravel. He plans to build a three room house. Nizomjon hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to purchase of cement and gravel.

loans.name: Maria Amalia

texts.pt:
Nasceu na cidade de Maputo, Província do mesmo nome, Sul de Moçambique, casada e mãe de 2 filhos todos frequentam a Escola. Fez o nível primário e parou por falta de condições financeiras pela parte dos pais. Vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.

É negociante há mais de 15 anos, dedica-se a venda de produtos alimentares e tem um rendimento de cerca de 6.000.00mt, que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancária (BIM).
Nunca teve empréstimo noutros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku através de uma amiga que também é cliente desta instituição. Este é o seu primeiro empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 20.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar produtos (óleo, arroz, amendoim, farinha, e outros), para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
Compromete se a pagar devidamente e no futuro pretende ampliar a sua actividade comercial construindo um estabelecimento para expor os seus produtos, para tal tenciona solicitar mais empréstimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
She was born in the town of Maputo, province of the same name, southern Mozambique. She's married and has two children, all of which attend school. She went to elementary school and stopped because her parents lacked financial conditions. She lives with her family in a house she owns and does not support anyone else.
She has been a businesswoman for over 15 years. She sells foodstuffs and earns an income of about 6.000mt. She uses it to pay for home expenses and also saves part of it in her bank account.
She has never had loans in other banks. She first heard of Hluvuku through a friend who is also a client of this institution. This is her first loan with Hluvuku. It is for 20.000mt, which she intends to use to purchase goods (oil, rice, peanuts, flour, etc.) in order to increase the volume of her merchandise.
She pledges to make her repayments as scheduled. In the future, she intends to expand her business by building a venue where she can display her products. For that she plans to request other loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: to purchase oil, rice, nuts, flour, etc., for her food stall.

loans.name: Merlita

texts.en:
Merlita is 55 years old and married with three children.

She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines. Merlita is borrowing PHP 11,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizer and other tools for farming.

Merlita has been farming rice for 10 years and earns additional income from pig fattening.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream, which is to save enough money to buy more farmland.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other tools for farming.

loans.name: Jahongir

texts.ru: Чахонгир трудолюбивый и умный человек. Более 10 лет он занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур и животноводством. Начал свой бизнес с теленка и 50 соток земли. Со временем у него расширилось животноводство: теленок вырос , он приобрел еще одну корову и 2-х овец. Данный момент он планирует выращивание на 1,5 гектарах земли кукурузы, и умножить поголовье  крупнорогатого скота. Чахонгир запрашивает займ для покупки селитры для выращивания кукурузы.
texts.en:
Jahongir is a hardworking and smart man. He has been engaged in cultivation of crops and in livestock breeding for more than 10 years. He started his business with a calf and 50 acres of land. In time he has expanded the livestock breeding: The calf grew up, and he acquired an additional cow and two sheep. Currently he plans to grow corn on 1,5 hectares of land and multiply the cattle population. 

Jahongir asks for a loan for the purchase of nitrates for growing corn.

loans.use: to buy nitrate

loans.name: Umid

texts.ru: Умид женат и ответственный отец четверых детей. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Более 10 лет Умид занимается купле- продажей скота. У него довольно богатый опыт в бизнесе. Он хорошо знаком со спецификой  данного бизнеса. В бизнесе помогает жена. Умид запрашивает займ в размере 5000 Сомони для покупки скота с целью расширения оборотного капитала.
texts.en:
Umid is married and the responsible father of four children. His wife stays at home. Umid has been engaged in buying and reselling livestock for more than 10 years. He has a rather rich experience in the business. He is very familiar with the specifics of it. His wife helps him. 

Umid asks for a loan in the amount of 5 000 somoni for the purchase of cattle with an aim to increase the working capital.

loans.use: To buy cattle

loans.name: Celia

texts.en:
Celia works hard to support her family. Celia is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

Celia requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional fish to sell.

Celia has been in this business for seven years now.

In the future, Celia would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase additional fish to sell

loans.name: Abdusharob

texts.ru: Абдушароб женат и на воспитании имеет четверых детей. Он очень трудолюбивый и добросовестный человек, который более 11 лет занимается купле- продажей скота. В обороте имеет 4 голов крупного рогатого скота. Имеет опыт в бизнесе и постоянно старается увеличивать поголовье скота. Хорошо знает специфику разведения крупного рогатого скота. Также занимается выращиванием и продажей лука. Абдушароб запрашивает займ для покупки скота и корма для них. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en:
Abdusharob is married and is raising four children. He is a very hard working and honest man, who has been engaged in buying and reselling cattle for more than 11 years. He owns four heads of cattle. He has experience in the business and constantly tries to increase the total number of livestock. He knows the specifics of breeding cattle, and is also engaged in growing and selling leek. 

Abdusharob requests a loan for buying cattle and fodder for them. He hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy cattle and feeds for them

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es: Virginia es socia del Banco Comunal Lindo Amanecer, tiene 34 años, se dedica a la venta de leña y también hace bordados en tela y tejidos en lana, es madre de 3 niños y socia de Finca Perú desde hace 4 años, antes solo se dedicaba a la venta de leña pero ahora estando en Finca pudo aumentar su capital y así poder progresar y sacar adelante a sus hijos, valora mucho las enseñanzas que ha recibido en las capacitaciones de su Banco Comunal, porque le ayudan a ser mejor madre y negociante, gracias a los préstamos ella pudo comprarse su terreno, le encanta ahorrar, ahora esta pensando que hacer con sus ahorros. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de lana.
texts.en: Virginia, 34, is a member of the Lindo Amanacer (Beautiful Dawn) communal bank.  She sells firewood and also does embroidery on cloth and knits wool.  She is the mother of 3 and has been a member of Finca Perú for the past 4 years.
